assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The subject deals with the history of Estonia in the 18th-19th century. The subject examines the social, everyday, economic and cultural conditions of Estonia and examines the most important persons and events that influenced the development of Estonian history during the observed period.
description.et: Aine käsitleb Eesti ajalugu 18.-19. sajandil. Aines vaadeldakse Eesti ühiskondlikke-, olmelisi-, majanduslikke- ja kultuurilisi olusid ning tutvutakse olulisemate isikute ja sündmustega, mis mõjutasid Eesti ajaloo arengut vaadeldavalt perioodil.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to introduce Estonian history in the 18th - 19th centuries through social, economic and historical circumstances.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on tutvustada Eesti ajalugu 18.-19. sajandil läbi sotsiaalsete, majanduslike ja ajalooliste olude.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has completed the course:
- has basic knowledge of the background of Estonian history 18-19. century
learning_outcomes.et: - omab põhiteadmisi Eesti ajaloo taustast 18.-19. sajandil

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the historiography of Estonian history
- knows the most important events, persons and dates in Estonian history
learning_outcomes.et: - teab Eesti ajaloo olulisemaid sündmuseid-, isikuid ja daatumeid

learning_outcomes.en: - can characterize the development of Estonian history in the observed period
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab iseloomustada eesti ajaloo arengut vaadeldaval perioodil
